name: Ancient Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon
text:
Ancient Dark Magician + Ancient Red-Eyes B. Dragon + Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon
This card must first be Fusion Summoned or summoned by the effect of "Ancient Power Released". This card is unaffected by card effects, unless they target this card. While this card is on the field or in the GY, it cannot be banished. If this card is Special Summoned, you can discard 1 "Ancient Inferno Fire Blast"; Inflict 4000 damage to the opponent's LP. Twice per turn, you can target 1 card your opponent controls; Destroy it, then if it is a monster, inflict damage to your opponent's LP equal to that monster's original ATK. If your opponent activates a card or effect, you can discard 1 card; (Quick Effect) negate that card or effect and destroy it, and if you do, this card gains 1000 ATK and DEF. You can only use this effect of "Ancient Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon" once per turn. If this card leaves the field by an opponent's card effect, during the End Phase of this turn: Banish all cards your opponent controls.
